modName: Replace Nightingale Blade with a Stealthy Katana
summary: This replaces the Nightingale Blade with the Blades Katana, which was also retextured to give a more stealth feeling.
descriptionHtml:
This sword replaces the Nightingale Blade, sheath and all! I felt that the Nightingale Blade was too.... amateur for such an elite group like the Nightingale, so I went ahead to make a replacer.

NOTE: This retexture also replaces the texture of the Blades Sword so they will look the same. 

For just a retexture of the Blades Katana, refer to my other mod:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3712#

To get this weapon, go to your console by hitting the \"~\" key. Then type in:
player.additem F6527 1

This mod is best used with:
Nightingale Prime: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1896
Blades Sword Damage Increase: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2362

If anyone would like to retexture this, you are welcome, just credit me!
If anyone has any suggestions to future color textures just mention it. I am also planning to make this a standalone when the CK comes out, giving it stats that contribute to a light armored/stealth/thief/archer gameplay style.

---------------------------------------------INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS-----------------------------------------------------
Just copy \"textures\" into the data folder in your Skyrim directory.



Credits: Inspiration for the blade part was from ababuobi.
author: Snoopy
